Name: Username
RegistrationHelpMessage:
- Username can contain only basic letters and spaces 
- Username must be between 3 and 20 characters long
- Password must be between 8 and 20 characters long and must contain one of each: Digit, Lowercase letter and Uppercase letter
TermsAndConditions: Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
MaxThoughtsValidation: Maximum thoughts must be at least 10
MaxThoughtsHint: Default value is 100. You can increase it to see more thoughts but the graph might not perform as well - both in terms of performance and readability.
CurrentNumberOfThoughtsLabel: Current number of thoughts on Aphantasia:
DeleteThoughtsPositionsHint: This will delete the positions saved in your browser. The graph will have to stabilize again on the next load.
NoNotifications: No replies yet. Think of a thought and some will appear here;-)
